citations.narrative:
The wooden trim, on one side of the goat shelter, has been damaged and now has protruding, jagged edges that could
injure the goats. The damaged trim on the shelter should be repaired to ensure structural strength and to protect the
goats from injury.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: FEBRUARY 22, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The wooden trim, on one side of the goat shelter, has been damaged and now has protruding, jagged edges that could 
injure the goats.  The damaged trim on the shelter should be repaired to ensure structural strength and to protect the 
goats from injury. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  FEBRUARY 22, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
